text: Nascar on Sky was the branding used for telecasts of Nascar races produced by Sky Sports, and televised on Sky Sports 1, Sky Sports 2, Sky Sports 3, Sky Sports Xtra (later renamed as Sky Sports 4) in the United Kingdom. ==Sky Indycar broadcasts== ===Races covered by Sky=== Race Track Years covered Budweiser Shootout Daytona International Speedway 2007-2012 Daytona 500 Daytona International Speedway 2007-2012 Gatorade Duel Daytona International Speedway 2007-2012 ===Broadcasts=== Year Race Circuit Coverage Channel Host Analysts 2008 Budweiser Shootout Daytona International Speedway Live Sky Sports Xtra Keith Huewen Ben Collins 2008 Aarons 499 Talladega Superspeedway Live Sky Sports 2 Keith Huewen Paul Cherry John Mickle 2009 Budweiser Shootout Daytona International Speedway Live Sky Sports Xtra Keith Huewen John Mickle David Tuckman 2009 Gatorade Duel Daytona International Speedway Live Sky Sports 3 Keith Huewen John Mickle David Tuckman 2009 Daytona 500 Daytona International Speedway Live Sky Sports 2 Keith Huewen John Mickle David Tuckman Category:NASCAR Category:2007 British television series debuts Category:2012 British television series endings
title: NASCAR on Sky
